Title: Pingu Cannot Lose
Plot: Pingu and Pinga are bowling. Pinga takes the first throw, and doesn?t score, but then rolls up herself and knocks all the skittles down. Pingu is not very amused; he is very surprised! Then Pingo comes by and has a go; he knocks down two skittles. Pingu throws and hits four. Pingo?s next throw gets one, and Pingu gets four again.
